block.p: National Basketball Association NBA--Named Andrew Messick senior vice president, international. Continental Basketball Association IDAHO STAMPEDE--Re-signed Rory White, coach, for the 2000-01 season. International Basketball League TRENTON STARS--Named Jeff Malone coach.

National Basketball Association NBA--Named Andrew Messick senior vice president, international. Continental Basketball Association IDAHO STAMPEDE--Re-signed Rory White, coach, for the 2000-01 season. International Basketball League TRENTON STARS--Named Jeff Malone coach.

National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS--Waived DT Eric Swann. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Agreed to terms with QB Spergon Wynn on a four-year contract. JETS--Signed WR Yatil Green. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Announced the retirement of NT Joel Steed. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Agreed to terms with LB Nate Webster on a three-year contract. TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with RB Mike Green. Signed LB Peter Sirmon.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Named Terry Simpson assistant coach and, Mike Babcock coach of the Cincinnati Ducks of the AHL. BOSTON BRUINS--Signed D Jamo Kultanen, D Pavel Kolarik and F Eric Manlow. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Named Nick Beverley assistant general manager. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Named Newell Brown associate coach. Signed F Serge Aubin to a two-year contract. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed RW Christian Matte to a one-year contract. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed LW Sean Haggerty and G Chris Mason. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Signed D Josef Boumedienne.
East Coast Hockey League TALLAHASSEE TIGER SHARKS--Named Gerry Fleming coach.
Major League Soccer LOS ANGELES GALAXY--Named Timothy Luce vice president of business operations and general manager.

BIG WEST CONFERENCE--Named Erica Satterfield conference compliance officer and Kaia Hedlund special projects director. BOSTON COLLEGE--Named Mike Enright associate athletic director for media relations. CARTHAGE--Promoted Stephanie Ulicny to women's cross country coach and women's associate head track and field coach. CLEMSON--Announced the resignation of Ralph White, women's track coach. DREXEL--Named Lynn Milligan, Pam Durkin and Kim Stoll women's assistant basketball coaches. GEORGIA TECH--Named Eddie Lee Ivery assistant strength and conditioning coach. HARTFORD--Promoted women's assistant basketball coach Mimi Walters to women's associate basketball coach. LEES-MCRAE--Named Casey Bates women's softball coach. NEBRASKA-KEARNEY--Announced the resignation of Mike Sumpter, athletics director, to take the same position at Southern Utah. NORTH CAROLINA--Named Matt Doherty men's basketball coach. NORTH GREENVILLE--Announced the resignation of Ronny Fisher, men's assistant basketball coach, to take a similar position at Presbyterian. PENN STATE--Named Natalie Ciccone sports information assistant. PRINCETON--Named Maureen Davis women's softball coach. ST. FRANCIS, N.Y.--Named Jamie Hoffman women's assistant basketball coach. YALE--Named Will Porter women's crew coach.
